channel.title: Mcda on AInI
channel.description: Recent content in Mcda on AInI

item.title: Xtrategy
item.description: knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE) Every novel approach borns when you think differently, when you don’t let contrains frame a project and when you are passionate about what you are trying to achive. In this case, starting with no previous knowledge on the solution of the problem and having a great mentor were the bigest factors to develop a new approach. A novel mind is usually more likely to think out of the box and with good guidance it can lead to great things.
